name: Unlimited Cars
description:
Current world record: 572 by me. Controls:

Move: A and D or arrow keys

You control an unlimited number of cars, try to avoid the obstacles!

Please share your high scores in the comment, and please include a screenshot, it helps me improve the game, and if your high score beats the current world record, your name will be shown at the beginning of this page.

Credits :

Music: from Zapsplat.com

SFX: from Pixabay

Tool used:

Game engine: Unity

Pixelart editor: Piskel

IDE: Microsoft visual studio 2019
